description:
Welcome to a Kids First Parents Second Course. Matt Sossi will be your instructor. Matt has been a Texas Family law attorney since 1992. In less than thirty minutes you will be able to understand the basics of the language typically contained in a Texas parenting plan.

Matt will take you through popular myths and misunderstandings that lead to unnecessary conflict. This is the only course available that will help divorcing parents understand their choices PRIOR to filing for divorce. This is also the only course that helps divorcing parents understand that while divorce does not necessarily affect children, conflict does.
title: How to read your Texas Decree of Divorce
